metadata.description: Weights of various objects from atomic to planetary scale

data.name: Water Molecule
data.description: Mass of a single H2O molecule

data.name: Human Hair (single strand)
data.description: Average weight of one strand of human hair (~1 mg)

data.name: Grain of Rice
data.description: A single grain of white rice (~20 mg)

data.name: US Penny
data.description: Weight of a modern penny coin (2.5 g)

data.name: iPhone 15 Pro
data.description: Weight of Apple's 2023 flagship phone (187 g)

data.name: E-waste per Person (annual, global avg)
data.description: Average electronic waste generated per person per year globally

data.name: Plastic Waste per Person (annual, US)
data.description: Average plastic waste per US resident per year

data.name: Food Waste per Person (annual, US)
data.description: Average food waste per US resident per year

data.name: Dairy Cow
data.description: Average weight of adult dairy cow

data.name: Statue of Liberty (copper only)
data.description: Weight of copper in the statue

data.name: Golden Gate Bridge
data.description: Total weight of the bridge structure

data.name: Burj Khalifa
data.description: Total weight of world's tallest building

data.name: Great Pyramid of Giza
data.description: Estimated total weight of the pyramid

data.name: Mount Everest
data.description: Estimated total mass of the mountain

data.name: Annual Aviation CO2 Emissions
data.description: Global aviation CO2 emissions per year (~915 million tonnes, pre-2020 levels)

data.name: Annual Cement Production
data.description: Global cement production per year (~4.1 gigatonnes)

data.name: Annual CO2 Emissions - Germany
data.description: Germany's annual CO2 emissions (~675 million tonnes)

data.name: Global Annual Plastic Production
data.description: Total plastic produced worldwide per year (400 million tonnes)

data.name: Global Annual CO2 Emissions
data.description: Total CO2 emissions from fossil fuels per year (37 gigatonnes)
